channel.title: I have a problem with RunServer.bat
channel.description:
Hey,
whenever I run RunServer.bat it says that testscape will start on: 0.0.0.0 : 43594 but on my router I couldn't put al 0.0.0.0 so I don't know how to fix this problem. any help would be greatly appreciated. :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 12:09:25 PM[/size][hr]no help at all -.- omfg. I looked at tuts and none of them showed this problem

item.title: I have a problem with RunServer.bat
item.dc:creator: @ImmortalKaine ImmortalKaine
item.description:
@ImmortalKaine wrote:

I had problems with runserver.bat too, only the problem was as soon as it opened, it closed. So I found this edit thing for compile.bat here which turned into a compiler/server running .bat which I now use instead of runserver.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with RunServer.bat

item.title: I have a problem with RunServer.bat
item.dc:creator: @Hell_Hound Hell Hound
item.description:
@Hell_Hound wrote:

Wait ok so if it starts on 43594 just change your port to that and log in?
Confused me at the but on my router i couldnt put al 0.0.0.0 so i dont know how to fix this problem.
Lol well
post anymore problems, and ill try to fix

Read full topic
